title: What technologies does CNN website use? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to the site Built With: CNN.COM Technology Profile on BuiltWith  Cnn uses: - Varnish for fast page caching (my website also uses Varnish) - Dyn DNS for DNS lookups (this is what was under attack a few weeks ago) - Amazon Route 53 - DNS web service - Shockwave Flash Embed (probably for video - Several Advertising plugins (too many to list) - Analytics and Tracking (too many to list) - Turner CDN, Akamai, CloudFront, Fastly - CDN - content delivery network - JavaScript Libraries (a ton, but html5 and JQuery) - Audio / Video - CNN has their own system, but also uses a few others. - Mobile Libraries, including Apple Mobile Web Clips Icon, Viewport Meta - Lots of widgets and CSS media queries I hope this helps! -- Jeff

My understanding is that they actually know the location of the fountain of youth, which is the only explanation I have for the continued existence of Jane Fonda and Ted Turner. So, once again, wishes Trump technology.
